Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
main.controller.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
Controller for project-related operations in the BTO Management System. Handles creation, editing, deletion, and filtering of projects. Uses project name as the unique project identifier.
Since:
2025-04-17

      Gets all projects managed by a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      managerNRIC - Manager's NRIC
      Returns:
      List of projects managed by the manager

    • getVisibleProjects

      public List<Project> getVisibleProjects()
      Retrieves projects that are both visible and currently open.
      Returns:
      List of available projects

    • getHandlingProjects

      public List<Project> getHandlingProjects(String officerNRIC)
      Gets projects that an officer is handling (regardless of visibility) combined with all visible projects.
      Parameters:
      officerNRIC - Officer's NRIC
      Returns:
      Combined list of handling projects and visible projects

    • getProjectsByFilter

      public List<Project> getProjectsByFilter(Map<String,Object> filters)
      Gets projects filtered by various criteria.
      Parameters:
      filters - Map of filter criteria (e.g., neighborhood, flatType, status)
      Returns:
      List of filtered projects

    • generateProjectReport

      public String generateProjectReport(String projectName, Map<String,Object> filters)
      Generates a formatted report of applicants for a given project, with filters.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project.
      filters - Map of filters to apply (e.g., "maritalStatus", "flatType").
      Returns:
      The formatted report as a String.
